title: Be it know[n to all c]risten men and women, that thyse be the great indulgence [...]
author: St. Thomas's Hospital (London, England)
notes: List of indulgences granted to confraternity.
Title from opening words of text. Imprint and suggested date of publication from STC.
Identified as STC 21592 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
